piano

Class PianoKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • piano.PianoKey
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class PianoKey
extends java.lang.Thread
    Implements methods to play a Piano key based on given parameters
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Helion

      • playSample

        private void playSample(int value,
                        int velocity,
                        boolean status)
        Plays the sample given by name at the given velocity
        Parameters:
        value - MIDI location of the key
        velocity - Velocity to play the key at. Range: 0 to 127
        status - True if the key should be played, False if it should be stopped

        Parameters:

      • stopKey

        void stopKey(int value,
             boolean forced)
        Stops the key at the given MIDI location
        Parameters:
        value - MIDI location of the key
        forced - True if the sustain is not on, false otherwise

        Parameters:
